tools.description:
StrixDB Tools - Permanent GitHub-based Knowledge Repository
These tools allow you to store and retrieve useful artifacts in StrixDB.
DIRECTORY HYGIENE GUIDELINES: - Avoid creating unnecessary "Main" (top-level) directories. - Stick to sub-directories WITHIN existing main categories (e.g., use 'exploits/web/sqli' instead of creating a top-level 'sqli' directory). - "Main" directories should be general and reasonable. - Build your arsenal by organizing content into logical hierarchies!
Default Main Categories: - scripts: Automation scripts, shell scripts, utilities - exploits: Working exploits and PoCs - knowledge: Security knowledge, research notes, documentation - methods: Attack methodologies and techniques - tools: Custom security tools - configs: Configuration files and templates - wordlists: Custom wordlists for fuzzing - payloads: Useful payloads for attacks - templates: Report and code templates - notes: Quick notes and findings
You can create custom categories or sub-directories using strixdb_create_category()!

tool.name: strixdb_create_category
tool.description: Create a new category or sub-directory in StrixDB. PREFER creating sub-directories within existing main categories (e.g., 'exploits/web').

parameter.name: category_name
parameter.description: Name for the new category (lowercase, no spaces, underscores/slashes OK for sub-dirs)

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: Description of what this category is for

tool.name: strixdb_save
tool.description: Save an item to StrixDB for permanent storage. Be an ENTHUSIASTIC COLLECTOR! If something might be useful later, save it. Note: If the category doesn't exist, it will be created automatically!

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: Category for the item (scripts, exploits, knowledge, tools, configs, wordlists, payloads, templates, notes, or custom)

parameter.name: content_type
parameter.description: Type of content (text, script, json, python, javascript, yaml)

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: Search query (searches name, description, and content)

tool.name: strixdb_get
tool.description: Retrieve a specific item from StrixDB.

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: Optional category to list (None for all categories)

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: Maximum number of items to return (default: 50)

tool.name: strixdb_update
tool.description: Update an existing item in StrixDB.

tool.name: strixdb_get_categories
tool.description: Get all available categories in StrixDB with their descriptions.

tool.name: strixdb_get_stats
tool.description: Get statistics about the StrixDB repository.

tool.name: strixdb_get_config_status
tool.description: Get the current StrixDB configuration status. Useful for debugging.

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: Optional category to export (None for all)

parameter.name: item_data
parameter.description: Dictionary with item data (category, name, content, description, tags, content_type)
